banners.title: Anime Club at UC San Diego
banners.description: Meetings every Monday, and other social events throughout the quarter! We also have a very active Discord server!

banners.title: Animefest 2022
banners.description: Animefest 2022 was our biggest convention yet! Look out for information on our next Animefest!
